caption.p: The mean response to the non-structural proteins (NSP) measured as percentage inhibition (PI values), using the FMD NS ELISA kit. Calves were vaccinated with A22 IRQ and A MAY 97 monovalent vaccines, or left unvaccinated (UVC) and challenged with A VIT/15/2012. The error bars indicate the standard deviation for each group. The horizontal dotted red line indicates the cutoff (50% PI).
